name: XRoll
description:
Submission for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 153.

Theme: "Roll"

Gameplay

Run your spaceship at full speed through winding corridors full of obstacles!

Your only chance of surviving is rolling on the x axis.

Controls - Keyboard

A - roll left

D - roll right

Authors

  • SirMiloMilo
  • Raio-devduo
